description: '''Lyca Jane Epe Gairanod'''  (born November 21, 2004) is a [[Filipinos|Filipino]] singer and actress. She won the first season of ''[[The Voice Kids (Philippines season 1)|The Voice Kids Philippines]]'', where she landed a recording contract with [[UMG Philippines]] She subsequently made her first television appearance as an actress portraying herself in [[ABS-CBN]]'s ''[[Maalaala Mo Kaya]]'' and guested in ABS-CBN's ''[[Hawak Kamay (TV series)|Hawak-Kamay]]'' the following month.
